name: Space Battlers
description:
Space Battlers

Current Version: 1.0

Space Battlers is an arcade shooter in which the objective for the player is to kill as many enemy space ships as possible. The player will receive scores for killing enemy space ships. The game gets progressively hard, as the player progresses through the game by killing the enemy space ships and surviving.

Controls:

WASD - move the player (note that the player will move based on the crosshair/cursor placement).

Mouse1 - Fire

Other

If you'd like, please leave feedback and report bugs that you've found!

Have fun playing!
